Choose a seat by tapping the buttons above, the bar above the seats is a representation of the movie screen.
Which payment option do you wish to use?
Paying with iDeal requires you to input your bank account owner\'s name and number.
Payment successful. Tap the 3 dots in the top right corner and go to \'My tickets\' to see your tickets or tap the \'OK\' button to go back to movies.
